mapper.sql: SELECT F.facility_id as facility_id, name FROM inprog.facilities AS F INNER JOIN inprog.rooms_facilities AS RF ON F.facility_id = RF.facility_id
mapper.select: INSERT INTO inprog.rooms("number", floor, category_id, type_id) VALUES (#{number}, #{floor}, #{categoryId}, #{typeId}) RETURNING room_id as id
mapper.sql: SELECT room_id as id, "number" as number, floor, category_id, category_name, type_id, twin_bed, places, daily_price FROM inprog.rooms_view
mapper.select: SELECT F.facility_id as id, name FROM inprog.facilities AS F INNER JOIN inprog.rooms_facilities AS RF ON F.facility_id = RF.facility_id WHERE room_id = #{id}
